description.value: Your squad dashes past enemies, slicing their boot laces and breaking their belt buckles. Signal up to two squadmates within the aura of your commander's banner; these squadmates can Stride up to their Speed as a reaction. Each enemy they are adjacent to at any point during this movement must attempt a @Check[reflex|against:commander|options:inflicts:clumsy] save against your class DC or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 1} for 1 round (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 2} on a critical failure).
